snippet: The school bus maker Blue Bird is recalling more than 2,500 All American school buses and some transit buses to fix a problem that could make steering more difficult.
abstract: School bus maker Blue Bird is recalling more than 2,500 All American school buses and some transit buses to fix problem that could make steering more difficult; company is also recalling smaller number of school buses that may be prone to propane fuel leak.
lead_paragraph: The school bus maker Blue Bird is recalling more than 2,500 All American school buses and some transit buses to fix a problem that could make steering more difficult.

headline.main: Briefing: Blue Bird Recalls Buses to Fix Steering Problem
headline.print_headline: Blue Bird Recalls Buses to Fix Steering Problem
